original_text: “Son of man, these men have taken their idols into their hearts, and set the stumbling block of their iniquity before their faces. Should I indeed let myself be consulted by them?
korean_text: 인자야 이 사람들이 자기 우상을 마음에 들이며 죄악의 걸림돌을 자기 앞에 두었으니 그들이 내게 묻기를 내가 조금인들 용납하랴

sentences.original_text: these men have taken their idols into their hearts,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 자기들의 우상을 마음에 두었고,

sentences.original_text: and set the stumbling block of their iniquity before their faces.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 죄악의 거치는 것을 자기 앞에 두었느니라.

sentences.original_text: Should I indeed let myself be consulted by them?
